cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.firstText: At C-Blog, we use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and what options you have to manage them.
cookies.textOne: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, mobile phone, etc.) when you visit a website. Cookies allow the website to remember your activity and preferences over time, making navigation easier and improving the user experience.
cookies.pointTwo: 2. What types of cookies do we use?
cookies.textTwoA: These are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled in our systems. These cookies are generally set as a result of actions you take, such as setting your privacy preferences or filling out forms.
cookies.textTwob: These allow us to count visits and traffic sources to measure and improve the performance of our website. All information collected by these cookies is aggregated and therefore anonymous.
cookies.textTwoc: These cookies allow the website to provide enhanced and personalized features. They may be set by us or by third parties whose services we have added to our pages.
cookies.textTwoD: These are used to deliver relevant advertisements based on your interests. They can also be used to limit the number of times you see an ad and to measure the effectiveness of an advertising campaign.
cookies.textThreeA: Improve the functionality and usability of the website.
cookies.textThreeB: Analyze the performance of the site and understand how users interact with it.
cookies.textThreeC: Personalize the user experience by providing more relevant content and ads.
cookies.textThreeD: Collect statistical information about users' browsing behavior.
cookies.textFourA: You can configure your browser to reject cookies or to alert you when they are being used. However, please note that some site features may not work properly if you disable cookies.
cookies.textFourB: For more information on how to disable or control cookies, please visit the help section of your browser or refer to the documentation of the major browsers.
cookies.textFive: In some sections of our website, we may also use third-party services that place cookies on your device. These include web analytics providers, social networks, and advertising service providers. These cookies are subject to their own privacy and cookie policies.
cookies.pointSix: 6. Consent for the use of cookies
cookies.textSix: By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy. If you do not agree with the use of cookies, you can adjust your browser settings to reject them or stop using our website.
cookies.textSeven: We reserve the right to update this cookie policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the date of the last update will be modified at the top of this document.
cookies.textEight: If you have any questions or concerns about our cookie policy, please feel free to contact us at:

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.firstText: At C-Blog, the privacy of our users is a priority. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when accessing and using our blog.
policy.textOne: We may collect the following information when you interact with our site:
policy.textOneA: Name and email address when you subscribe to the newsletter or leave a comment.
policy.textOneB: Technical information such as IP address, browser type, operating system, and visited pages, automatically collected through cookies and similar technologies.
policy.textOneC: Any other data you voluntarily choose to share with us via forms or emails.
policy.textTwo: The information we collect is used to:
policy.textTwoA: Manage blog subscriptions and send newsletters.
policy.textTwoB: Respond to user inquiries or comments.
policy.textTwoC: Analyze site traffic and usage to improve performance.
policy.textTwoD: Comply with legal obligations where applicable.
policy.textThreeA: This site uses cookies to enhance browsing experience, personalize content, and analyze traffic. For more information, please see our Cookie Policy.
policy.textThreeB: You can configure your browser to reject or delete cookies, although this may affect the siteâ€™s functionality.
policy.textFour: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:
policy.textFourA: With service providers who help us operate the website (e.g., email marketing platforms), under confidentiality agreements.
policy.textFourB: When required by law or by a competent authority.
policy.textFive: You have the right to access, rectify, or delete your personal data, as well as to object to or request the restriction of its processing. To exercise these rights, you can contact us at:
policy.textSix: We are committed to protecting your personal data through appropriate security measures to prevent unauthorized access, disclosure, or destruction of information.
policy.textSeven: Our blog may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those sites. We recommend that you read their respective policies.
policy.textEight: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the date of the last update.
policy.textNine: If you have questions or concerns about this policy, please contact us at:
